description:
###### 50% OFF ######
####******Ver 2.0.0: Added Pictures, Video and Audio, fixed the known bugs. Now you will get perfect diary app form IA *******####

1.0.1: Now you can take backup. Fixed the support mail id. Sorry to all.  Edit menu included.***Please leave a review***.

 "When all is said and done, leading a good life is more important than keeping a good diary. 
-Sassoon, Siegfried Louvain" .

* Most of the successful people writing diaries to improve themselves. Do you want to know more about yourself and make yourself better? Then get started now with My Diary!! 
* People have been taking diaries since probably when they started writing. 
* There is something gratifying about writing one's memories and feeling at a moment and reviewing them later. 
* My Diary is a very good tool for keeping your diary private, anytime, anywhere. 
* This app will allow you to search diary by content. 
* You can take all your diaries backup to your mail. 
* This app is password protected. 
* It is very user friendly for writing the diary. It simulates your diary GUI. So you will not feel bore writing the diary. 
* Now you can insert the time stamp to your diary.
